name: Presentation & Speech Rubric
description: Rubric for evaluating oral presentations and speeches

excellent.description: Clear thesis/purpose. Logical flow. Strong introduction and conclusion. Key points well-developed
Confident posture. Effective gestures. Good eye contact. Natural movement

good.description: Good delivery with appropriate body language

needs_improvement.description: Poor posture, limited eye contact, or distracting movements

excellent.description: Clear articulation. Varied pace and tone. Appropriate volume. Minimal fillers

needs_improvement.description: Monotone, too quiet/loud, or excessive fillers

excellent.description: Professional slides. Clear visuals. Enhance understanding. Not over-reliant

needs_improvement.description: Poor slides or over-reliance on reading

excellent.description: Engages audience. Handles questions confidently. Shows deep understanding
